# Terminology Quick Reference (Russian ↔ English)

> Mapping of all SWADE game terms between English and Russian.

| English | Russian | Key Context |
|---------|---------|-------------|
| Wild Card | Дикая карта | Player characters, major NPCs |
| Extra | Статист | Minor NPCs/mooks |
| Wild Die | Дикий кубик | Extra d6 for Wild Cards |
| Raise | Подъём | Every 4 above TN |
| Benny | Фишка | Spendable luck tokens |
| Shaken | Шок | Can only free-act |
| Wound | Ранение | −1 per wound to all checks |
| Incapacitated | При смерти | 4th+ wound, Vigor check |
| Stunned | Оглушён | Prone + Distracted + Vulnerable |
| Distracted | Отвлечён | −2 to all checks |
| Vulnerable | Уязвим | +2 to checks against you |
| Entangled | Схвачен | Can't move, Vulnerable |
| Bound | Обездвижен | Can't move, Distracted + Vulnerable |
| Fatigued | Утомлён | −1 to all checks |
| Exhausted | Истощён | −2 to all checks |
| Soak Roll | Проверка на прочность | Vigor to negate wounds |
| Called Shot | Прицельная атака | Target specific body part |
| Gang Up | Объединение сил | +1 per adjacent ally (max +4) |
| Trick | Уловка | Contest to Distract/Vulnerable |
| Support | Помощь | Aid ally's next roll |
| Hold | Наготове | Delay turn, can interrupt |
| Recoil | Отдача | −2 for RoF > 1 |
| Pace | Шаг | Movement per round |
| Parry | Защита | Melee defense TN |
| Toughness | Стойкость | Damage threshold |
| Fighting | Драка | Melee attack skill |
| Shooting | Стрельба | Ranged attack skill |
| Athletics | Атлетика | Throwing, climbing, swimming |
| Notice | Внимание | Perception, awareness |
| Persuasion | Убеждение | Social influence |
| Stealth | Скрытность | Hiding, sneaking |
| Edge | Черта | Positive character trait |
| Hindrance | Изъян/Помеха | Negative character trait |
